title: Stage Lv8-C5-S31
description: Level 8 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: With a view to improving efficiency, we implemented new procedures.
The meeting was arranged for the purpose of discussing future plans.
learning_points: Level 8 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.kr: 효율성 향상을 목적으로 새로운 절차를 도입했습니다.
sentences.en: With a view to improving efficiency, we implemented new procedures.

sentences.kr: 회의는 미래 계획을 논의하기 위한 목적으로 마련되었습니다.
sentences.en: The meeting was arranged for the purpose of discussing future plans.

sentences.kr: 모든 사람이 이해할 수 있도록 상세한 설명을 제공하겠습니다.
sentences.en: In order that everyone understands, we will provide detailed explanations.

sentences.kr: 품질 보장을 위해 엄격한 검사를 실시했습니다.
sentences.en: With the aim of ensuring quality, we conducted rigorous inspections.

sentences.kr: 고객 만족도 향상을 목표로 서비스를 개선했습니다.
sentences.en: We improved our service with the intention of enhancing customer satisfaction.

sentences.kr: 비용 절감을 위해 새로운 공급업체를 찾았습니다.
sentences.en: We sought new suppliers for the purpose of reducing costs.

sentences.kr: 모든 사람이 참여할 수 있도록 시간을 조정했습니다.
sentences.en: We adjusted the schedule so that everyone could participate.

sentences.kr: 시장 확장을 목적으로 새로운 전략을 개발했습니다.
sentences.en: We developed a new strategy with a view to expanding the market.
